For twenty years, Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance has worked to ensure that every child in the world is protected from preventable diseases. The results are incredible. But their work is far from done. There are still too many children -- many living in some of the hardest-to-reach places on the planet -- who aren’t getting basic vaccines. Gavi is the best tool we have to reach them. #VaccinesWork
